timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: Updated PPCHWProfilerPrivate.hpp as well to document this connection.
replies.author: keithc-ca

timeline.message:
Enable runtime instrumentation with gcc

* copy definition of MTSPR from PPCHWProfilerPrivate.hpp
* document connection between j9ri.c and PPCHWProfilerPrivate.hpp
* remove dependency on OMR_ENV_GCC

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

Enable runtime instrumentation with gcc
